name: Mark Evan
opinion: As a Doctor, Dr. Mahfuzur Rahman is a very sharp minded and well trained doctor. I was his emergency patient few months ago.

name: Steve jack
opinion: My grandma has some mental issues. After some months of taking therapy form Dr. Mahfuzur Rahman, She is quite well.

name: Qabila
opinion: I was injured by a car accident one month ago and I immediately contact with Dr. Mahfuzur Rahman. Now I'm feel quite better.

opinion: A great mental healer I've ever seen. He is a highly recommanded doctor.

opinion: My girlfriend was so sick and someone suggest me to contact with this doctor, and My girlfriend dead!

opinion: With my husband's mental issues Dr. M treat him well. He is a highly recommanded doctor.
